name: A Ways Down
description:
This small game was the result of an unofficial 2-week long game jam between a couple of friends in order to pass time during the quarantine. It has a menu, one level, and a few enemies, and was extremely fun to make.

The core concept of this game is to move with the beat, attack with the beat, and doge spikes that are moving on the beat, all in an effort to escape the caves of the alien planet.

Walk and jump with WASD

Use the Left, Right, and Up arrow keys to attack

Music, art, code, all by Reid Tull
